value.title: Power BI report page tooltip - How to create one in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Patrick walks through what a Power BI report page tooltip is and how to create one in Power BI Desktop. This is a feature that was added to Power BI Desktop in the March 2018 release.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube

value.title: Power BI Tutorial: 4 Ways To Get Data
value.excerpt: In this Power BI tutorial, Adam looks at 4 ways to get data in Power BI. This focuses on Power BI Desktop and the main storage modes - Import, DirectQuery and Live Connections to Analysis Services. If you are new to Power BI, be sure to check out this Power BI Tutorial: 4 ways to get data.   Import (Excel)

value.title: Power BI vs Excel: When you should use each tool
